relation: If I Go It will Be Double
P1: 20m 15 [7B]; P2: 20m 14 [9B]. Ab down left chains for middle stance OR Ab down right chains 40m to ground.
If I Stay There Will Be Trouble 23 [9 Bolts] ends at mid chains.
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Bad Kloof" - South Africa Rock Climbing Routes Wiki
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {406572=Climbing.co.za © 2003-2014 Climb ZA. All rights reserved. Registration on or use of this site constitutes acceptance of our Privacy Policy and Disclaimer., 344780=Date Feb,2012: There is a R10 entry fee to walk into the kloof. A yearly permit can also be purchased from the Montagu Mountain Reserve office., 377298=Bad Kloof Routes from Left to Right. Note: Jan 2013, base under water, pack water-wings., 354772=Ed Feb bolted the The Mission in 1996 and this was the only route at Waterworld until a huge flood cleared out Bad Kloof of all the reeds. Waterworld then became easily accessible. Stuart Brown then put a digger into the kloof and built up the beachy base and bolted the great routes that are there today. Note: We now know that We are unable to put a digger into the Kloof to rebuild the base without an environmental impact assessment. In June 2011, another big flood washed away the base of the crag and made it entirely unclimbable. In October 2012, another flood redeposited enough sand to create a new base! In November we re-routed the river and Waterworld is now back. (see article: http://www.climbing.co.za/2012/11/montagu-waterworld-climbable-again/)}

Bad Kloof Climbing Map Date Feb,2012: There is a R10 entry fee to walk into the kloof. A yearly permit can also be purchased from the Montagu Mountain Reserve office. Fees, Permits, Etc Park at Montagu Mountain Reserve office aka Die Ou Meul and walk into the crags by crossing a wooden bridge behind the mill. The Kloof can also be entered from the back at Avalon Springs. The wiki runs from Die Ou Meul to Avalon Springs. How to get there 4.20 The Bar 4.19 The Hotel 4.18 The Rage 4.17
